title: No Champs in PICK A CHAMP lobby
body:
I just started a normal queue and then entered the lobby, there was no champs and even when they picked and locked champs nothing appeared.
http://imgur.com/a/YUAbZ
THEN ofcourse got banned for 6 minutes.

I waste like 6 hrs to get a part of a key And now i get banned to get lesser keys for no reason? come on.

replies.body: It looks like your client wasn't able to talk with our servers to figure out what it needed to display on your end. Most of the time we just need to make a few adjustments to your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but let me know if the steps there don't seem to help. Make sure to test all your changes in a custom or practice game first!
